en: Mummy Pig has made a special box for Peppa.
zh: 猪妈妈给佩奇做了一个特别的盒子。

en: Peppa, this box is just for you!
zh: 佩奇，这个盒子是给你的！

en: Thank you, Mummy!
zh: 谢谢妈妈！

en: It's a secret box for you to keep secret things in.
zh: 这是给你放秘密东西的秘密盒子。

en: What things can I put in it, Mummy?
zh: 我可以放什么进去啊，妈妈？

en: Only you can decide that, Peppa!
zh: 只有你自己能决定了，佩奇！

en: It's your secret box!
zh: 它是你的秘密盒子！

en: I know what I can put in it!
zh: 我知道我可以放什么进去了！

en: Good. But don't tell me.
zh: 好的。但不用告诉我的。

en: I won't tell you or George or Daddy!
zh: 我不会告诉你，乔治还有爸爸的！

en: It's a secret!!
zh: 它是个秘密！

en: George, this is my secret box!
zh: 乔治，这是我的秘密盒子！

en: It's empty. I have to find some things to put inside.
zh: 它是空的。我得找些东西放里面。

en: George wants to help Peppa.
zh: 乔治想帮佩奇。

en: No, George, only I must know what's in the box.
zh: 不，乔治，只有我可以知道里面放了什么。

en: You have to wait outside while I choose.
zh: 我选东西时你得在外面等。

en: Peppa is going to choose some secret things to put in the box.
zh: 佩奇选东西放进秘密盒子里。

en: Now, my secret box is full!
zh: 现在，我的秘密盒子装满了！

en: George, you must not look inside!
zh: 乔治，你不准偷看里面的东西哦！

en: George would like to know what is inside Peppa's secret box.
zh: 乔治想知道佩奇的秘密盒子里有什么。

en: If you like, you can try to guess.
zh: 如果你想知道，你可以猜猜看。

en: Dine-Saw!
zh: 恐龙！

en: George thinks Peppa has put a dinosaur in the box!
zh: 乔治认为佩奇把恐龙放进盒子里！

en: Oh, George!
zh: 哦，乔治！

en: You always say ''dinosaur'' for everything!
zh: 你总是把所有东西都说成“恐龙”！

en: Anyway, a dinosaur is too big to fit in the box.
zh: 至少，恐龙太大了放不进盒子里的啊。

en: George cannot guess what is in Peppa's secret box.
zh: 乔治猜不到佩奇秘密盒子里装的是什么东西。

en: Daddy Pig is cleaning a picture.
zh: 猪爸爸正在清理照片。

en: Daddy! This is my secret box!
zh: 爸爸！这是我的秘密盒子！

en: Mummy made it for me!
zh: 妈妈给我做的！

en: It's very nice, Peppa!
zh: 好漂亮的盒子，佩奇！

en: What's inside?
zh: 里面装了什么？

en: It's a secret!
zh: 这可是个秘密哦！

en: George tried to guess,but he didn't get it right.
zh: 乔治想猜，但他没猜对。

en: Can I have a try?
zh: 我可以试试吗？

en: Yes.
zh: 可以。

en: Hmmm. Have you put my glasses inside?
zh: 嗯。你把我的眼镜放里面了？

en: No!!! Your glasses are on your head!
zh: 不对！！！你的眼镜在你头上。

en: So they are!
zh: 确实是！

en: Silly Daddy! You must have a proper guess.
zh: 糊涂的爸爸！你得再猜猜。

en: Ok. Have you put Mummy's shoes in the box?
zh: 好的。你把妈妈的鞋子放盒子里了？

en: Nope! And that's all your guesses. Used up!
zh: 不对！你所有可以猜的机会，都用完了！

en: Peppa likes secrets!
zh: 佩奇喜欢秘密！

en: Mummy! No one knows what is in my box!
zh: 妈妈！没人知道我盒子里装了什么！

en: Oh. what has George got?
zh: 哦。乔治拿的是什么？

en: I made a box for George, too!
zh: 我也给乔治做了一个盒子！

en: And he's filled it with secret things!
zh: 他已经装满了秘密的东西！

en: And only George knows what's inside.
zh: 只有乔治知道里面装了什么东西。

en: Peppa would like to know what is inside George's box.
zh: 佩奇想知道乔治的盒子里有什么东西。

en: It's George's toy dinosaur, of course!
zh: 当然是乔治的恐龙玩具啦！

en: No!
zh: 不对！

en: George's toy dinosaur is not in George's box.
zh: 乔治的恐龙玩具不在乔治的盒子里。

en: It's too difficult! I'll never guess!
zh: 这也太难了。我永远也猜不到！

en: Peppa does not like secrets as much as she used to.
zh: 佩奇不像之前那么喜欢秘密了。

en: Maybe, if you showed George one thing from your box,
zh: 也许，如果你给乔治看一样你盒子里的东西，

en: then he could show you one thing from his.
zh: 那么乔治也可以给你看一样他的东西。

en: Ok. But we must do it at the same time.
zh: 行。但我们得同时进行。

en: That's a good idea.
zh: 这是一个好主意。

en: On the count of three, you each show what's in your boxes.
zh: 数到三，你们同时打开盒子。

en: Ready?
zh: 准备好了没？

en: Yes.
zh: 好了。

en: One... two... there!
George has a drum and Peppa has a trumpet.
zh: 乔治藏了个鼓，佩奇藏了个喇叭。

en: Lovely!
zh: 太棒了！

en: Yes, it sounds very nice.
zh: 是的，听上去很不错。

en: Do you have anymore secret things?
zh: 你们还有什么秘密东西吗？

en: George has a custard doughnut!
zh: 乔治藏了一个蛋奶甜甜圈！

en: But Peppa's box is empty.
zh: 但是佩奇的盒子是空的。

en: I've got nothing else!
zh: 我什么东西都没有了！

en: Luckily, I have! Come on. Tuck in.
zh: 幸好，我还有！来吧。快吃吧。

en: George, Peppa, Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig all like custard doughnuts!
zh: 乔治，佩奇，猪妈妈和猪爸爸都喜欢蛋奶甜甜圈！

en: I don't have a special box.
zh: 我没有特别的盒子！

en: But I know a very good place to hide my custard doughnut!
zh: 但我有个好地方可以藏我的蛋奶甜甜圈！

en: Can you guess where?
zh: 你们猜是哪里？

en: Um. Are you going to hide it in the fridge?
zh: 嗯。你打算把它藏在冰箱里吗？

en: No! Somewhere much more special!
zh: 不！一个更特别的地方！

en: My tummy!
zh: 我的肚子！

en: Delicious!
zh: 太好吃了！

en: I'm going to hide mine in my tummy!
zh: 我也要把我的藏在我的肚子里！

en: Me, too!
zh: 我也是！
